mapper.insert: insert into clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select c.id, c.name, c.room, c.begin_date as beginDate, c.end_date as endDate, c.master_id as masterId, c.subject, c.create_time as createTime, c.update_time as updateTime, e.name as masterName from clazz c left join emp e on e.id = c.master_id where c.id = #{id}
select id, name from clazz order by id
